title: Pluribus
overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.
reason: Highly anticipated with an 8.1 IMDb rating from over 76K votes, driven by acclaimed creator Vince Gilligan (Breaking Bad) and premium network Apple TV.

title: IT: Welcome to Derry
overview: In 1962, amid a spate of unexplained disappearances of local children, a group of misfit friends begin to suspect a long-buried ancient evil lurking. As the kids set out to determine what's really going on, a rising unease prompts several townspeople to work together to restore peace – all while a U.S. military operation seeks to exploit Derry for its own objectives.
reason: Generating massive buzz with an 8.0 IMDb rating from over 71K votes, leveraging the popular IT franchise on HBO with director Andy Muschietti.

title: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms
overview: A century before the events of Game of Thrones, two unlikely heroes wandered Westeros: a young, naive but courageous knight, Ser Duncan the Tall, and his diminutive squire, Egg. Set in an age when the Targaryen line still holds the Iron Throne and the last dragon has not yet passed from living memory, great destinies, powerful foes, and dangerous exploits await these improbable and incomparable friends.
reason: Immense anticipation for this HBO prequel set in the Game of Thrones universe, created by George R. R. Martin, ensuring significant cultural impact.

title: Monster: The Ed Gein Story
overview: The shocking true-life tale of Ed Gein, the infamous murderer and grave robber who inspired many of Hollywood's most iconic on-screen killers.
reason: High interest for this Netflix anthology installment from prolific creator Ryan Murphy (Dahmer, AHS), featuring well-known actor Charlie Hunnam.

title: Boots
overview: After impulsively joining the U.S. Marine Corps, a bullied teen finds new purpose — and unexpected brotherhood — with his motley team of fellow recruits.
reason: Strongly rated with a 7.9 IMDb score from over 22K votes on Netflix, featuring recognizable actress Vera Farmiga.
